TopicTitle: Does anybody use an arc a770?

Articles.Content:
Does anybody use an Arc a770? Would like to get information on it's ksp performance (1080/1440/2160). Also having information on it's performance with eve+scatterer would be nice.

Edited March 1, 2023 by rettter3

Reviving an old post here:

I'm running a ACER Predator Bifrost ARC a770.  So far I'm rather pleased with the results so far. I've had issues with Scatterer (game crashes) but for the short time I ran it it did look fantastic. EVE I confess I never tried it.

The Intel ARC's might not be top of the line, but for the price they aren't bad at all. Heck of alot better than the integrated chip graphics.
